songs.title: Believe in your heart
songs.lyrics:
Paroles de la chanson Believe In Your Heart :
How many times in my life have I questioned
Scared to make a choice
Because I’m afraid of what may come
I question it all the time
The second thing I could’ve asked
I can’t escape the past but now it’s time to leave it behind

No regrets I don’t want to hear them
You don’t have enough time to think twice
Don’t you wish upon a star ’cause you’ve gotten this far
And when any day could be your last believe in your heart

I’m no longer living for what I haven’t done
Things have changed I’m better now
I’m taking it day by day (taking it day by day)

And I feel the way I should
And you should do do it if you could
And I can’t tell you how could this feels

No regrets I don’t want to hear them
You don’t have enough time to think twice
Don’t you wish upon a star ’cause you’ve gotten this far
And when any day could be your last believe in your heart
Believe in your heart

No regrets I don’t want to hear them
You don’t have enough time to think twice
Don’t you wish upon a star ’cause you’ve gotten this far
And when any day could be your last believe in your heart
